Line 220: Line 220:
===Hogsmeade Station===
===Hogsmeade Station===
â
[[Image:Hogwarts Express.jpg|left|thumb|The Hogwarts Express departs from King's Cross.]]
 
'''Hogsmeade Station''' is the closest train stop to Hogwarts; the [[Hogwarts Express]] stops here after travelling from [[King's Cross railway station|King's Cross]]. Scenes involving Hogsmeade Station in the Harry Potter films were shot at [[Goathland railway station]] on the [[North Yorkshire Moors Railway]], built in [[1865]] and virtually unchanged, that serves the village of [[Goathland]] in the [[North York Moors]].
'''Hogsmeade Station''' is the closest train stop to Hogwarts; the [[Hogwarts Express]] stops here after travelling from [[King's Cross railway station|King's Cross]]. Scenes involving Hogsmeade Station in the Harry Potter films were shot at [[Goathland railway station]] on the [[North Yorkshire Moors Railway]], built in [[1865]] and virtually unchanged, that serves the village of [[Goathland]] in the [[North York Moors]].
According to Rowling's illustrations, Hogsmeade station is not actually in Hogsmeade, but on the opposite side of the lake.<ref>[http://www.hp-lexicon.org/atlas/hogwarts/atlas-h-jkrmap.html HPL: Hogwarts: JKR's hand-drawn map<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
According to Rowling's illustrations, Hogsmeade station is not actually in Hogsmeade, but on the opposite side of the lake.<ref>[http://www.hp-lexicon.org/atlas/hogwarts/atlas-h-jkrmap.html HPL: Hogwarts: JKR's hand-drawn map<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
